1.12.0.11.1:
Changed the info toggle hotkeys to be able to work as "key groups", so that you can toggle multiple info types with the same key
Added a separate info type for the entire C-line from the F3 screen and changed the old option to only show the number of rendered chunk sections
1.12.0.11.0:
Added more info type
Added the option to select the order of the info lines

1.11.2.0.11.1:
Changed the info toggle hotkeys to be able to work as "key groups", so that you can toggle multiple info types with the same key
Added a separate info type for the entire C-line from the F3 screen and changed the old option to only show the number of rendered chunk sections
1.11.2.0.11.0:
Added more info type
Added the option to select the order of the info lines
1.11.2.0.10.0: Added biome registry name and looked-at-entity registry name info types
1.11.2.0.9.1: Fixed getting the world seed from a chat message in multiplayer
1.11.2.0.9.0:
Added configurable info toggle hotkeys
Changed the key press logic
1.11.2.0.8.0: Add BlockState properties as a new available info type
1.11.2.0.7.1: Fix a typo in the slime chunk data type bitmask >_>
1.11.2.0.7.0: Add the option to show slime chunks
1.11.2.0.6.0: Add options to require sneaking or holding a key to render the HUD

1.11.0.9.0:
Added configurable info toggle hotkeys
Changed the key press logic
1.11.0.8.0: Add BlockState properties as a new available info type
1.11.0.7.1: Fix a typo in the slime chunk data type bitmask >_>
1.11.0.7.0: Add the option to show slime chunks
1.11.0.6.0: Add options to require sneaking or holding a key to render the HUD
1.11.0.5.1: Fix the FPS counter that broke in the 0.5.0 version
1.11.0.5.0:
Add an option to display real world time
Add an option to display the looked-at entity name and health
Fix a bug in parsing the text background color
Only update the text once per game tick instead of each frame
1.11.0.4.5: Add options to show the dimension ID and world time

1.9.4.0.4.2:
Prevent a crash when outside of the world (like in the void)
Fix compatibility with Java versions before 8
1.9.4.0.4.1: Strip extra stuff from the end of the entity count line

Add parsing the colors from hex format
Add individual toggle options for the information types
Some configs changed because of this, delete your old config!!

Add entity count as an available information type
Add config option to sort the lines by their length
Add a config option to change the coordinate line's formatting
